SEARCH
Module com.example.sm_project
Package com.example.sm_project4

Class BuildYourOwnPizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.sm_project4.BuildYourOwnPizzaController
public class BuildYourOwnPizzaController extends Object
This class represents the controller for the BuildYourOwnPizza.fxml file. It handles user interactions and updates related to building custom pizzas. It utilizes JavaFX components for the GUI. The class includes methods for initializing, updating pizza details, handling toppings, and placing orders. It communicates with the MainMenuController to access store orders.
Author:
Fraidoon Pourooshasb, Samman Pandey

      public void handleAddTopping()
      Handles the addition of toppings to the pizza. Checks the number of toppings and updates the pizza price accordingly.

    • handlePlaceOrder

      public void handlePlaceOrder()
      Handles the placement of the pizza order. Validates the number of toppings and updates the store order accordingly.

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Resets the pizza builder to default values. Clears selected and additional toppings, resets checkboxes, and sets default size.

    • OrderAddedPopup

      private void OrderAddedPopup()
      Displays a popup alert indicating that the pizza has been added to the order.
